data.name: SPACE ASTEROID SHOOTER üåÄ RETRO ACHIEVEMENT ODYSSEY
data.detailed_description:
We are just two friendly apes who learned how to make games in our free time and now love to bring our often crazy ideas to live in all kinds of games. Please expect our games to be smaller, raw experiences.
We always love to chat with you guys and greatly appreciate all of your feedback in order to become better game creators. Just tell us your questions or ideas on the forums, Twitter or Facebook. If you encounter bugs or any problems, we will do all we can to ensure the best support that a drunken ape could possibly give.
Have fun playing - DRUNKEN APES


  • Space Asteroid is a cool top-down survival shooter with retro aesthetic and arcade-style gameplay!
  • Survive as long as you can and earn Achievements over time!
  • worlds first achievement driven storytelling... with achievements! Play, unlock, experience the meta-story!
  • collect points and power-ups to survive even longer
  • face frantic enemies while dodging the asteroids
  • have fun while listening to funky sci-fi music
  • cutting-edge VHS retro wave filters from the future's past, for the future's future!
  • enjoy classic mechanics infused with modern juiciness! SO juicy, you can make true space lemonade!
INTO SPAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACE !

data.short_description: GET READY TO BLAST YOUR WAY INTO THE ENDLESS SPACE AND SURVIVE AS LONG AS YOU CAN AGAINST DANGEROUS ASTEROIDS AND DEADLY ENEMIES!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX600 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes, please.
  • Additional Notes: Nobody exists on purpose. Nobody belongs anywhere. We're all going to die. Come and play the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 90X SPACE EDITION
  • Processor: I X77 ULTIMATE NEON
  • Memory: 128 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce TITAN RETRO WAVE V
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: UNIVERSAL APOLLO 1337
  • Additional Notes: Make sure to use UBER SPACE GAME MODE

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS X
  • Processor: i5 or better
  • Graphics: Anything is fine.
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Cool background music requires a sound card ;)
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

highlighted.name: in a galaxy far, far away...
the evil empire of the asteroids
That man is me. Captain Curtain...
A story full of despair, love and empty space.
A story so full of story that even the most uninterested once
will have problems to not listen to it.
